timeline.message: support micro-meter, percentile, and simplify the agent code
add more test case, micrometer adapt document, support micrometer `LongTaskTimer` histogram/percentile.
Adding micrometer UT, optimized the adapt micrometer code
Change percentile check time range, make it more stable

timeline.bodyText: You should provide an agent config to limit this size, in order to avoid OOM.

timeline.bodyText: This should be in the final in order to keep the backend connected forever.

timeline.message:
1. Add mor comment
2. Rename `exceptMinValue` to `minValue` on Histogram
3. Remove Percentile
4. Add more description at the Application-toolkit-micrometer.md
5. Add max meter size config
Make long task timer UT more stable

1. Remove agent.rate_counter Config
2. Wrapper Meter as interface, and use MeterFactory to build the meter

1. Fix typo
2. Change FunctionTimer as counter type

1. Histogram using absolute value to report
2. Fix document
3. Remove LongTaskTimer histogram
Merge branch 'meter-agent-api' of https://github.com/mrproliu/skywalking into meter-agent-api
